ðŸ“– Summary: Beszel is a lightweight server monitoring platform designed for homelabs and self-hosted environments. It provides Docker statistics, historical data, and configurable alerts through a user-friendly web interface. Key features include multi-user support, OAuth authentication, automatic backups, and a REST API for custom integrations.
